content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator x times, open parenthesis, x plus 1, close parenthesis, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the natural log of, the absolute value of x, end absolute value, plus, the natural log of, the absolute value of, x plus 1, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>|</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the natural log of, the absolute value of x, end absolute value, minus, the natural log of, the absolute value of, x plus 1, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>|</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the natural log of, the absolute value of, x plus 1, end absolute value, minus, the natural log of, the absolute value of x, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>|</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="2 times the natural log of, the absolute value of x, end absolute value, minus, the natural log of, the absolute value of, x plus 1, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>|</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>
